settings.instructions:
Read the following question presented before you and select the correct border on the map.

Select "next" and "prev" to cycle through all the questions.
settings.intro: Time to learn about political borders. Good luck, citizen!

prompt.question: 1 of 5 - Select the international border between the United States and Canada.
2 of 5 - Select the state border shared by Texas and New Mexico.
3 of 5 - Select the international border between Mexico and Guatemala.
4 of 5 - Select the international border that New York state shares with another nation.
5 of 5 - Select a state border that Arizona shares with another U.S. state.

wrongFeedback.title: Nice try
wrongFeedback.cont: Select the "next" button to continue to the next question.
wrongFeedback.restart: Select "continue" to close this window and the "restart" button to return to the first question.
